name: Mini Museum
description:
Mini Museum is a short exploration game that finds Marty passing time on a rainy day at the beach with his friends. They are amassing debris and knickknacks to create a collection worthy of the finest museum in the world.

  • Arrow keys or WASD to move around and talk.
  • Interact with NPC and Items by colliding into them.

Created using Bitsy and Tracery.
